title: New Chroma Skins
body:
"We priced chromas at 290 RP each, and weâ€™re also introducing recurring IP sales that will take place twice a year. The first IP sale goes from August 25, 2016 to September 8, 2016 and includes all chromas launched before August 2016. During the IP sale, chromas will be sold individually for 2000 IP."

From what I understand this means that the new chroma skins in the shop should have an ip pricetag as well but when I went to check this wasnt true and only the older chromas had the older ip pricetag, did I read the as riot post wrong or were we lied to?

replies.body: Chromas that are available to purchase for IP are those that were created before August of this year, per our[ chroma pack faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204475264-Chromas-Packs-FAQ).  The new ones just released today technically aren't before August, and are not included in the current IP sale.

Hey friend, I'm wondering if you could ask ecommerce and let me know when this sale is finished? IE IP sale. I couldnt find it in the FAQ when this current sale ends.

Thanks pal.
Yea I just saw the FAQ, but the original post should have been more clear about it since I avoided purchasing champs for a few zed chromas, but its fine I can always just wait or use RP.
